cells.data: -- The mapMaybe function is a version of map which can throw out-- elements. In particular, the functional argument returns-- something of type Maybe b. If this is Nothing, no element is-- added on to the result list. If it just Just b, then b is-- included in the result list.
-- mapMaybe :: (a -> Maybe b) -> [a] -> [b]on mapMaybe(mf, xs)	concatMap(compose(mf, my maybeToList), xs)end mapMaybe
